errors.error_description: The link to the 'Snake Charmers Tactical Manual' points to a non-existent file within the 'py-evm' repository.
The 'git clone' command uses an invalid URL 'https//github.com' due to a missing colon, which will cause the clone operation to fail.
correction_candidates: Change the command to 'git clone https://github.com/ethereum/py-evm.git'.
Change the command to 'git clone git@github.com:ethereum/py-evm.git'.
Change the command to 'git clone git://github.com/ethereum/py-evm.git'.
errors.golden_answer: Change the command to 'git clone git@github.com:ethereum/py-evm.git'.
